General.Name: Banka BioLoo Limited
General.Description: Banka BioLoo Limited provides products and services for sanitation and waste management system in India. It manufactures, supplies, and installs bio-toilets. The company is also involved in the operation and maintenance of bio-toilets for Indian railways; and setting-up of fecal sludge treatment plants and packaged sewage treatment plants. In addition, it offers bio-digester, footloo, pluto, and urban sewage treatment plant. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

4.Name: Mr. Akhilesh Kumar Tripathi
4.Title: Director of Technical & Railways and Whole Time Director
